subject: Re: [junit] TestSuite - Order of test execution
msgSnippet: ... Yes, they are. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com 2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile
messageBody:
John H. E. wrote:
> Hi all,
>
> I know that I shouldn't write tests that depend on other tests etc.,
> but I would still like to know for sure...
>
> When I run a JUnit test suite ("regular", not Active), are the tests
> run in the order in which they were added to the suite?

Yes, they are.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
